use nyc_taxi_ldw
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE gold.usp_gold_trip_data_green
@year VARCHAR(4),
@month VARCHAR(2)
AS
BEGIN

    DECLARE @create_sql_stmt NVARCHAR(MAX),
            @drop_sql_stmt NVARCHAR(MAX);
    
    SET @create_sql_stmt=
    'CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.trip_data_green_' + @year + '_' + @month +
        ' WITH 
        (
            LOCATION=''gold/trip_data_green/year=' + @year + '/month=' + @month + ''',
            DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
            FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
        )
        AS
        select td.year,
        td.month,
        cast(td.lpep_pickup_datetime as date) as trip_date,
        tz.borough,
        cal.day_name as pickup_day,
        CASE WHEN upper(cal.day_name) in (''SATURDAY'',''SUNDAY'') THEN ''Y'' else ''N'' END AS trip_day_weekend_ind,
        SUM(CASE WHEN upper(pt.payment_type_desc)=''CREDIT CARD'' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS card_trip_count,
        SUM(CASE WHEN upper(pt.payment_type_desc)=''CASH'' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS cash_trip_count,
        sum(CASE WHEN tt.trip_type_desc =''Street-hail'' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as Street_hail_trip_count,
        sum(CASE WHEN tt.trip_type_desc =''Dispatch'' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as Dispath_trip_count,
        round(sum(td.trip_distance),2) as trip_distance,
        round(sum(DATEDIFF(SECOND, lpep_pickup_datetime, lpep_dropoff_datetime) / 3600),2) AS trip_duration_hours,
        round(sum(td.fare_amount),2) as total_fare_amount
        FROM
        silver.vw_trip_data_green as td
        JOIN silver.taxi_zone tz ON td.pu_location_id=tz.location_id
        JOIN silver.calendar cal ON cast(td.lpep_pickup_datetime as date)=cal.date
        JOIN silver.payment_type pt ON td.payment_type=pt.payment_type
        where td.year=''' + @year + ''' and td.month=''' + @month + '''
        GROUP BY td.year,
        td.month,
        cast(td.lpep_pickup_datetime as date),
        tz.borough,
        cal.day_name';

    print(@create_sql_stmt);

    EXEC sp_executesql @create_sql_stmt;

    SET @drop_sql_stmt=
        'DROP EXTERNAL TABLE gold.trip_data_green_' + @year + '_' + @month;

    print(@drop_sql_stmt);

    EXEC sp_executesql @drop_sql_stmt;

END;
